# Lab2FHIR Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-14

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.11+ + FastAPI (web framework), SQLAlchemy (ORM), Pydantic (validation), PyPDF2 or pdfplumber (PDF text extraction), FHIR.resources (FHIR R4 models), httpx (HTTP client for LLM APIs) (001-lab-pdf-fhir-converter)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```
